features: Deep cleans and rids your skin of dirt, oil and impurities without drying skin, leaves your skin feeling refreshed and clean
Ideal for full body and facial cleansing
body.description: This bar is specifically formulated to remove dirt, oil and other impurities. It has a rich lather and rinses clean without leaving a heavy residue or drying skin. It leaves your skin feeling refreshed and clean.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,278 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #3 in Facial Cleansing Bars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CETAPHIL Deep Cleansing Bar is clinically proven to gently remove dirt, oil and impurities without overdrying skin or stripping away its natural protective oils or emollients. This gentle cleanser washes away dirt and bacteria in 20 seconds while maintaining the skin’s natural moisture barrier. It rinses cleanly without any heavy residue, leaving your skin feeling soft and clean. CETAPHIL Deep Cleansing Bar is dermatologist recommended and specially formulated to be non-irritating and gentle on even the most sensitive skin.

Biggest benefits: CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin* *IQVIA 2022 CETAPHIL cleansers effectively yet gently clean without stripping or leaving skin feeling dry and tight. CETAPHIL skincare products are developed with and clinically tested by dermatologists. *IQVIA 2022

Steps for a sensitive care routine with CETAPHIL Step 1: Deep cleansing for your face and body CETAPHIL Deep Cleansing Bar is the perfect addition to your daily cleansing regimen. It’s specially formulated for use on sensitive skin, making it an excellent cleanser for the face and body. Using wet hands, work cleanser into a rich, creamy lather. Massage all over your body and face, then rinse with water to leave skin feeling soft, clean and hydrated. Step 2: Cleansing throughout the day Maintain good hygiene and keep your hands soft and clean throughout the day by regularly washing with CETAPHIL Deep Cleansing Bar. This cleanser contains surfactants to wash away bacteria and germs in just 20 seconds. Leaving you to enjoy healthy, nourished skin. Step 3: Follow with a CETAPHIL body moisturizer to lock in hydration After cleansing, follow with a moisturizer to help replenish the skin’s natural moisture barrier and lock in long-lasting hydration. This step helps to nourish and protect the skin from dryness. Complete your sensitive skin care routine with CETAPHIL Moisturizing Lotion Use your preferred CETAPHIL moisturizer to lock in long-lasting hydration. CETAPHIL Moisturizing Lotion immediately replenishes and protects with 24-hour moisture lock. Its unique formula is fast absorbing, lightweight and works to completely restore the skin’s natural moisture barrier in 1 week.

Gentle Cleansing Bar Deep Cleansing Bar Ultra Gentle Soothing Body Wash Ultra Gentle Body Wash Moisturizing Lotion Moisturizing Cream Skincare benefit Gently cleanses without irritation and leaves skin feeling hydrated, smooth and soft Deeply cleans and removes dirt, oil and other impurities without drying skin Gently cleanses even the most sensitive skin and immediately soothes dry skin Gently cleanses without stripping skin of its natural moisture, while delivering nourishing ingredients to help maintain the skin’s moisture barrier Non-greasy, lightweight lotion protects face & body against dryness for 24 hours Rich cream nourishes in 1 day and completely restores skin’s moisture barrier in just 1 week Skin type Sensitive skin/Dry to normal Sensitive skin/Dry to normal Sensitive skin/Dry to Very dry skin Sensitive skin/Dry to normal Sensitive skin/Dry to normal Sensitive skin/Dry to Very dry skin Key ingredients Glycerin Vitamin B3 Aloe vera, marigold flower extract Aloe vera, vitamin B5 Avocado oil, vitamins E & B5 Sweet almond oil, vitamin E Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Won’t clog pores (Noncomedogenic) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fragrance free --- --- ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have been using this product for years per request of my dermatologist. Great deal, will buy again. Works well with my skin. No drying, cleans deeply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Keeps skin softer than most face soaps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and Refreshing Bar Soap
reviews.reviewText: I decided to give this bar soap a try based on the positive reviews, and I'm really glad I did. This soap is gentle yet effective, leaving me feeling clean and refreshed throughout the day. The natural scent is subtle, which I appreciate, and it's perfect for sensitive skin. Reading the reviews about feeling clean even in hot weather was spot on it truly helps combat that sweat feeling. Overall, a great option for those looking for a reliable bar soap that does exactly what it promises.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cetaphil bar soap now SMELLS BAD
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know what Cetaphil did to the formula but these last few bars I’ve gotten smell horrible. I’ve used Cetaphil bar soap since the 90s and it’s always had a light, pleasant, smell. The smell in my last shipment of 6 bars was so bad I thought my wash cloth was sour. Tried a new wash cloth, it was the Cetaphil bar soap! It smells like straight sour lye. It’s awful. I canceled my subscription order for it (had it for 3 years!)Please Cetaphil.. change it back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this soap, though it's a little pricy. great for a good clean and it's not too soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Face Soap
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used the daily facial cleaner for YEARS. I’ve started transitioning everything in the bathroom from liquid to bars. I was resistant to swap my favorite face cleaner UNTIL I saw they had a bar version. I think it may actually work better than the liquid cleaner I used for years! My face feels so clean and soft after. The ONLY reason it gets 4 stars and not 5 is that it is wrapped in plastic inside the little cardboard soap box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good soap for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent soap. The scent is very mild, almost undetectable, and my skin does not itch with it. I have used it for a couple of years and continue to be happy with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very fussy about my skin. I have been using Cetaphil bars and cream for years. It is my go to product to keep my skin supple by daily cleansing and moisturizing

Las barras dermolimpiadoras dejan super suavecita la piel y lo mejor es que su aroma es neutro. Cuando lavas tu rostro con este jabón, puede que al inicio se reseque un poco la piel, pero con una crema hidratante se resuelve. Lo recomiendo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: very good for improving and moisturising

The product is fine, nice scent and help with dry skin. My only problem is the advertising for this product, you only get one bar, YES a single bar of soap instead of 6 like in the picture. Way too expensive. Extremely deceitful, be careful and look for another listing.

The media could not be loaded. I received the 3 bars, but the packaging is strange. The product details are fully printed only on the outer plastic wrapper. The sides of the 3 bar-soap boxes are mostly blank. Only one end of each box states the soap's name and manufacturer. I had purchased a Cetaphil soap bar before, from my local pharmacy, and that box had the normal product details fully described on all sides of the box...
Excelente producto muy emoliente, rico aroma y antibacterial.
